message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,200,000. I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations and deliver exceptional value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,400,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I recognize your budget considerations, the value of this product is substantial. I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000. This revised offer reflects a more accurate assessment of the product's worth.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still aiming to keep within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,600,000.
